name: Fantasy Dungeon
description:
Crawl your way through 20 different dungeons as you fight over 50 enemies on your way to glory. Dungeons are procedurally generated in 12 different themes and can be replayed as often as wanted. Don't like a dungeon, redo it and give it another shot. Endless replayability!

Each dungeon takes about 1 hour to get through. 20 levels means 20 hours of gameplay per character. With 3 distinct character classes, that comes to about 60 hours of total gameplay.

Choose from 3 classes ( fighter, mage or archer ) and fully customize your hero:
  • Customize armor, weapons, accessories, hair, beards and even skin color
  • Over 60 different weapons and shields based on character and level
  • Accessorize your hero with bling, head gear, sun glasses and more
  • Different styles of game play based on character

Your character progress is saved at every level. Make changes to your character at anytime and replay the levels as often as you like. Leave the dungeon at anytime, make changes and get back in.

Unlock over 120 different skills based on character and level. Each class with its own unique skills to learn and master.
  • Fireball / Fire Bolt / Fire Comet
  • Lightning Shot / Lightning Strike / Lightning Chain
  • Power Shot / Bleeding / Vine Spikes / Poison Shot
  • Ice Bolt / Ice Shot / Ice Spikes
  • Critical Hit / Ruinous Slash
  • Rage / Berserk
  • Melee attacks
  • and more

Over 50 different enemies to slay:
  • Goblins
  • Ghouls
  • Trolls
  • Skeletons
  • Rogue Knights
  • Golems
  • Mechanoids
  • and more
